variable.name: clinic
variable.description: A1. Identifying information. De-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified date form completed

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID

variable.name: ndb1a
variable.description: B1a. Information on transfer to inactive status. Catastrophic injury or illness leading to coma, dementia, or inability to participate in EDIC testing procedure
variable.value: Catastrophic injury or illness leading to coma, dementia, or inability to participate in EDIC testing procedure

variable.name: ndb1b
variable.description: B1b. Information on transfer to inactive status. Inaccessibility to monitoring of outcomes

variable.name: ndb1c
variable.description: B1c. Information on transfer to inactive status. Patient has withdrawn consent

variable.name: ndb1d
variable.description: B1d. Information on transfer to inactive status. Patient has agreed to participate

variable.name: ndb1e
variable.description: B1e. Information on transfer to inactive status. Information on transfer to inactive status: other

variable.name: ndb3a
variable.description: B3a. Information on transfer to inactive status. On what date would the proposed transfer to inactive status. If uncertain, check here

variable.name: ndb3dat
variable.description: De-identified date inactive status to become effective

variable.name: ndc1
variable.description: C1. Plans for future contact. De-identified will clinic attempt to contact patient

variable.name: ndc2
variable.description: C2. Plans for future contact. De-identified willing to return to clinic
